TPaper Theme for Ubuntu

Paper is a very flat iOS inspied theme for Ubuntu that in my opinion vastly improves the looks of the default ubuntu install:

Theme – Paper Project – snwh.org

// to defer the loading of stylesheets // just add it right before the tag // and before any javaScript file inclusion (for performance) function loadStyleSheet(src){ if (document.createStyleSheet) document.createStyleSheet(src); else { var stylesheet = document.createElement('link'); stylesheet.href = src; stylesheet.rel = 'stylesheet'; stylesheet.type = 'text/css'; document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(stylesheet); } }
